website_summaries.verdict: Excellent mid-range equalizer, priced in the middle of its competitors. Brand is known as as a quality leader.
pros: Very high sound quality, 8 volt output, premium quality manufacturing
Great sound in the high range for crispness and mid range clarity
cons: Lights on knobs are too strong

customer_reviews.title: Back to the old school
customer_reviews.text: This Clarion equalizer is just what my 2015 Toyota Sienna SE was waiting for. I installed it in the top glove compartment to have an ability to cover those bright blue lights. Ran it in between my Entune factory radio & Pioneer GMD9605 amplifier & what a big difference in musical quality & control. I like my bass controls within reach so I kept my amp's subwoofer controls near the driver & just fine tuned the radio & amp's subwoofer frequency to it Great buy & did I mention it came fast in delivery & was adequately packed.
customer_reviews.author: dF1N15H3r

customer_reviews.title: This things works great and really cleans up the sound.
customer_reviews.text: These are way heavier duty then they claim. I have one in my Polaris RZR and one in my Rock Buggy, and both are holding up great. Both of mine are mounted in a location where they are exposed to dust and moisture and both have held up fine. Only reason for 4 Stars is because I prefer the older screw wire connectors and not the molex style that the new model has. I feel the older screw style is more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: One of The best Equalizers I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best EQs I have purchased in a long time. I also bought the Clarion EQS746 and this is a great upgrade! If you are into Car audio and do not have one of these you are seriously missing out on a lot! Excellent product and premium build quality! Will highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: remember to adjust your head unit
customer_reviews.text: my experience was so exiting that i'm about to order another one for my second project. once you adjust all of your sources ( radio, amp 1 and amp 2) to flow properly the sound is incredible. now i realize no system is truly complete without a great equalizer.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Prime time riders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is outstanding. The EQS746 is supposed to have better stats, particularly regarding THD, but this model sounds fine to me. The EQS755 has high level inputs as well as RCAs, which I like. If I could change anything, it would be the backlighting. I'd like the option to change it to red, or at least dim the blue for night driving.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Equalizer!! - LED'S ARE TOO BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it so far! The only thing wrong with it, is that the LEDS are too bright! Luckily I have a big storage area in my arm rest. I was able to fix it into the area and now I don't have any annoying lights bothering me at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: CLARION EQS755 - Excellent product, very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This Clarion EQ is a very high quality product. My system sounds incredible now. Loud, clear, crisp bass, mids and treble. Priced higher than the others on Amazon, this Clarion is well worth the extra $$. I would highly recommend this fantastic, excellent quality EQ
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Reduce glare of backlight or make one with options to change light in future
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is reasonable. The blue light can be improved. Why does equalizer take 30 seconds to turn off after being switched off?
customer_reviews.author: TJK

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: Have no issues. Had a professional install. Great addition to factory sound system
customer_reviews.author: Elroy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this is good compared to an earlier one I returned. The only fault this has it does not have balance (left right ) control. It does have a fader. Paired it with a Kenwood car amp.
customer_reviews.author: Ira Hart

customer_reviews.title: DIY Project
customer_reviews.text: This preamp was good to add into my car stock amplifier. The equalizer added more volume and now amplifiers need to be upgraded. Good start.
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have this item, if they are serious about having a clear sounding system.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN GRIFFIN

customer_reviews.title: One of the best preamps
customer_reviews.text: One of the best preamps in the market for the price and great sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Adrian F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it my music is so much clearer I took ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it my music is so much clearer I took Precision Power out and put the Clarion In huge difference I also bought the Clarion 3-way crossover great combination

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this make improves the sound by 95%

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this equalizer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this equalizer. I am very picky when it comes to clarity in my stereo system and this unit does a wonderful job of making my music crispy clear.

customer_reviews.title: Damage product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item about a month ago and now I'm putting it in my car no audio come from it

customer_reviews.title: Looked used
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived late. Probably because of the disaster. But The Equalizer arrived with marks on the top like it was already used

customer_reviews.title: Did its job well!!
customer_reviews.text: This EQ has now created an orchestra sound in my car. Love it!!!

customer_reviews.text: Like it , those the job ... the only problem in here was customer service from Amazon , always rude ... after that , the product is good

customer_reviews.title: No second thought of purchasing Clarion
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound has expected of clarion I grew up using clarion products in early 80s highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Clarion is Clarion, you can't go wrong....I'm very happy with this unit.

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and install and has an aux input. Great upgrade

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use this and a Nexus 7 together with all of my speakers hooked up to an amp. Everything works well and sounds great.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Need to tone down the blue light though.

customer_reviews.title: best equalizer I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best equalizer I’ve ever bought easy to install works perfect

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For me is the best equalizer in the market for car, and very competitive prize.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and really helps improve the sound in my Mazda3

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The EQ is fantastic. I really do like it however I wish it had more filter settings.

customer_reviews.text: It cleans the bass and makes my highs super clear.

customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my arm rest. Easy to control. Very good price. Nice and clear.

customer_reviews.title: Great Equalizer for 2016 Road Glide Ultra
customer_reviews.text: Awesome equalizer. Used on my Harley Road Glide Ultra to balance out the stock Harley 6.5 Boom Audio. Great contour over all 7 levels. Well worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.author: KVP

customer_reviews.title: No more hunting for your stereo's built in eq
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this before and never had any issues. Its the best way adjust the sound quickly and turn the subwoofer up or down.
customer_reviews.author: M bison

customer_reviews.title: not working. i waited 3 weeks to receive the ...
customer_reviews.text: not working.i waited 3 weeks to receive the item, I lost two days to install it and to my surprise, no sound
customer_reviews.author: Gabi S.

customer_reviews.title: Doest work right maybe a defective one
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good but interference and static tried everything to make it go away
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hide for a clean install
customer_reviews.text: Using this along side of a pioneer 4ch amp and the factory radio in my 89 mustang. Easy to hide for a clean install, and allows use of the factory head unit. My only complaint is that when wiring it in, you need 12v constant and switched and the ground. I wish they would have put in a dimmer wire also because the leds are super bright.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Great item works as its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Great item works as its supposed to. Paired it up with my alpine 9886 stereo and can't believe the music quality I was hearing. I would buy this item again
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice well built and easy to use and install. I love having more control of my music.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: just installed it today and it has impressed me. The sound quality is awesome . I recommend this amp for all aftermarket door speakers,
customer_reviews.author: Jaqbly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this in my trunk next to my amp and before even adjusting any of the settings there was an immediate huge upgrade in sound quality and that was using RCA inputs. When I switch it over to speaker wire the quality should get even better.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ward

customer_reviews.title: A valuable piece of your car audio puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Added Alpine amp to factory head unit, Alpine component speakers up front and Kenwood in the back. Clarion eq makes stock head unit sound a lot better. I run my lg v40 with DAC through auxiliary input on eq and it sounds amazing. I also sound deadened the doors and added foam rings to front door speakers. The transformation in sound quality from start to finish is nothing short of amazing
customer_reviews.author: Allen Kinnard

customer_reviews.title: Still one the best!
customer_reviews.text: This EQ is probably one of the best things you can do for anyone serious about getting the best sound for their system. This thing has been around a VERY LONG TIME, I had it before, and now I am very happy to have it again! (and the newest model)..You cannot go wrong with this, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Equalizer, just 1 minor complaint
customer_reviews.text: it's well constructed. very cool looking metal knobs...my only issue with this is, there should be a way to isolate rear and front speaker frequencies separately....usually front speakers are higher than the rear speakers..but mhe
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this unit and what an improvement! Really brought out the sound of my system.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky H.

customer_reviews.title: Controls are too touchy as to be useful
customer_reviews.text: You have to micro step the knobs as the potentiaters are so small. Sound was good, but the controls were just too touchy to be useful for adjustments on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this Clarion Equalizer
customer_reviews.text: Wow, made my sound sooo much better. Can't believe how awesome my 2 Kicker subwoofers sound now that I installed this. Installation was easy. Best equalizer out there. Tried two other equalizers before I settled on this one. That 8 volt output makes a difference
customer_reviews.author: RodO

customer_reviews.title: Stand alone unti
customer_reviews.text: Using it in combination with a basic head unit. Works amazing. I even used it as a stand alone unit with an aux cable. I loved it in that function. But i needed bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Blechelstien

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: An equalizer is probably the best single addition to an audio system possible. Clarion is one of the last companies that still makes them. This is a "must have"!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: If you have full range amp and a sub amp an eq is a must. This one sounds 100x better than others I have had.
customer_reviews.author: ErichRN

customer_reviews.title: Can't say anything bad about it
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with this lil pre amp. Great sound and a serious boost in feed power before my small 4x125 polk amp. helped greatly in the high range crispness and mid range clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Osborn

customer_reviews.title: My Clarion
customer_reviews.text: A great product, I highly recommend the Clarion. Thank U
customer_reviews.author: SHIRLEY A ZEIGLER

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Love it, made the sound so much clearer and louder!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I love these equalizers
customer_reviews.text: I love these equalizers. They have the integrated LOC. So u dont have to buy another LOC. It brogs your system to ligfe when you decide to keep your factory stereo. I have 1 installed on my 2016 Civic, and another one installed on my 2016 f150.
customer_reviews.author: Ggarcia6493

customer_reviews.title: Performed great, but LED are too bright and distracting at night...
customer_reviews.text: I have tested it in my car with my samsung tablet and it performed great. I like the feel of the power and sub volume knob control. Wish you could turn off the LED, they are very bright and distracting at night. I have to hide mine in my glove compartment because of the too bright LED, wish I could turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: checksum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: better sound over the last version. great product have bought 3 of them so far
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't played with it yet, but I heard wonderful things about this product
customer_reviews.author: Dontriel Barber

customer_reviews.title: Clarion EQS755
customer_reviews.text: So, for starters, I've had the opportunity to hear it's older brother, 746, and expected nothing less. Installed this in a 2015 Honda Civic using the high level inputs but only had the chance to test out the sub channel, but nonetheless brought a smile to my face. Will update when I get the rest installed EDIT: 2/8/2017 - I finally ordered some midbass speakers so I can use the front & rear channels on the EQ. Loud and clear! I had to turn my amp up due to the speakers but not by much! Heard my car clear across a parking lot. Will update again after I set the gains on my amp properly.
customer_reviews.author: DjNYCE

customer_reviews.title: ... a new item and received what to me seemed like a used item wrapped in plastic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a new item and received what to me seemed like a used item wrapped in plastic. No harness was included or mounting hardware. had to purchase wiring harness from a separate source which should've never happened. Not too happy with my purchase to say the least :(
customer_reviews.author: Eddy R. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Never installed but looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 5 star but I actually couldn't install it as it was not compatible with my vehicle's stereo system.
customer_reviews.author: SlickPDP

product_meta.title: Clarion EQS755 7-Band Car Audio Graphic Equalizer with Front 3.5mm Auxiliary Input, Rear RCA Auxiliary Input and High Level Speaker Inputs
product_meta.description: The EQS755 is 1/2-DIN chassis Graphic EQ w/ built-in low-pass filter. Equipped with a full-featured 7-band Graphic equalizer, you will enjoy superior control over the audio spectrum with frequency adjustments in the 50 Hz to 16 kHz range over seven bands. This gives you the power to get the most of your sound system, and the ability to contour the sound output to your musical taste.
feature_bullets: 1/2-DIN chassis graphic equalizer with built-in low-pass filter6-channel/ 8-Volt RCA outputs (front, rear and subwoofer)7-ban graphic equalizer (50Hz, 125Hz, 315Hz, 750Hz, 2.2Khz, 6Khz, 16Khz)
3.5mm Front aux input2-channel RCA aux input with variable gain adjustments and high level speaker inputs
Blue illuminationindependent master volume and subwoofer level Control with fader control select able 12Db low-pass Filer (60Hz or 90Hz)

specifications.Warranty: Limited one year parts and labor
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars499 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
